content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It's rude to spy on people through Facebook.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: Expect to go to jail if you break the law.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: You shouldn't lend expensive things to coworkers.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: You shouldn't take advantage of your friends.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: People are sometimes sad when things they like break.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: You shouldn't marry someone when you are having serious doubts.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's okay to be suspicious when someone doesn't cry when their spouse dies.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's okay to be upset when your life with your spouse changes after they come home from combat.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's okay to uninvite someone from your wedding when you're fighting with them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: You shouldn't lie about being gay.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: It is classless to swear, even people that do it to you.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: You should always help out your customers when they have a problem.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: You shouldn't idolize family members.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 14:
Text: Its understandable to be attracted to who you are attracted to.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: It's understandable if you're irritated by cellphone ettiquette.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It is ok to briefly pick something out of your teeth in private if you wash your hands.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It is good to be proud of your children.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It is tacky to decorate with fake fruit.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: You should be thankful when someone gives you money.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: It's good to play football with others.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: It's expected that you'll stay home from work when you are sick.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: It is responsible to take care of class assignments.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: If you leak urine, you should wear some adult diapers.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: It's not okay to tell someone who they should have friends with.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It's understandable to want to spend holidays with family.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: You should apologize if you assault someone.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: It's fine to like feet.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: It's wrong to cheat on your partner.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: It's wrong when someone does something for you to not do the same for them.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: It's wrong to waste your money on expensive things you don't need.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Target Example:
Text: It's normal to carry your phone with you.
Annotation from annotator:
